## Loading and preprocessing the data
First, unzip the provided zip file in the current directoy, and then read it.
```{r }
unzip("activity.zip", files=c("activity.csv"))
rawdata <- read.csv("activity.csv")
```

Second, convert the string representation of date column as Date class.
```{r }
rawdata$date <- as.Date(rawdata$date, "%Y-%m-%d")
```

Display a few observations.
```{r }
head(rawdata)
```

Display the summary.
```{r }
summary(rawdata)
```
